title: Library document management UI — browse, preview, download, share
description: Upgrade the Library from a catalog view to a full document management interface. Browse work products with search/filter, click to preview rendered content in-browser (markdown→styled HTML), download individual or bulk, share via links. The export system (DEVCO-6) provides the backend — this is the human-facing UI.

comments.author: jeff@devco
comments.body: Built and deployed. Full doc management UI: search/filter/sort, rendered markdown preview with syntax highlighting, download (md/html/text + bulk ZIP), share links with expiry/password/max-downloads, quick preview modal, prev/next navigation. Same treatment for Writers Room articles. 10 files, 1039 lines. Committed and pushed.
